steps.title: Enter the YouTube video link
steps.description: Provide the URL of the YouTube video you want to generate the thumbnail for.

steps.title: Select thumbnail quality
steps.description: Choose the desired thumbnail quality from the available options (High, Medium, Low).

steps.title: Click 'Generate' button
steps.description: After selecting the thumbnail quality, click the 'Generate' button to create the thumbnail.

steps.title: Download the thumbnail
steps.description: Once the thumbnail is generated, it will be displayed, and you can download it by clicking the 'Download' button.
